scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/my65site/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/my65site
  set jcr:title{String} to "My AEM 6.5.8 Site"
end
create service user draftEnrichmentService with path system/my65site

set ACL for draftEnrichmentService
  allow jcr:read,jcr:write,jcr:modifyProperties on /content/forms
end
